HJ: Not helpjuice found for this issue
Issue: Pop up appear: "Configuration Download not working." when trying to start the Unite Software
RC: Conflict with the modules and Unite so the Software try to download it again.
Solution: Change the name to the Configuration Download Folder and run a repair installation.
Step 1: Take the logs from the PC
Step 3: A new pop up appear saying: "Unable to secure connection"
Step 5: Change the name to the Configuration Download Folder
